name: Ant's Trail
description:
This is a simple puzzle game made for the Game-Off 2021 game jam. The aim is to guide your ants by drawing lines in order to reach the blueberry.

There are only two levels right now and this is more of a demo of the concept rather than a complete puzzle game.

It's pretty goofy but it was fun to make so whatever.

Controls:

- Left Click ants to select, then left click  again and hold to start drawing path

- WASD to move camera around

- Hold Right click to rotate camera

- Scroll wheel to adjust camera zoom.
